about_the_game:
Feel free to check out the demo of the game, which is available here on Steam! Share your thoughts and feedback on the Discord server, or in the Steam Community Hub!

The Vanished Soul is an indie, first-person, psychological horror game made by one person. It is set in 2016 in the fictional place called Novazenica, and it has quite a few references to my actual home country, Bosnia and Herzegovina. Step into the shoes of the main protagonist as you solve the mysteries that begin to unfold in Novazenica. In addition to the realistic and atmospheric setting of The Vanished Soul, you will have to solve various puzzles to progress. While exploring, discover various side story elements, interact with many objects in the game, and immerse yourself in the atmosphere with numerous sound elements.

The game doesn't rely heavily on grotesque and gore elements but instead tries to slowly bring discomfort to the players through lighting, sounds, and effects. Combine that with the story elements, and you will have a realistic and atmospheric experience in this horror game. The Vanished Soul is powered by Unreal Engine 5, which brings some of the latest technologies, like real-time global illumination, helping you immerse yourself in the game as much as possible!

Step into the shoes of the main protagonist as you solve the mysteries that begin to unfold in Novazenica and its surroundings. The game will try to create a bond between you and your loved ones. Discover and unravel the mysteries that unfold one by one as you play. It is up to you to discover and sort out the things from the past! You will be able to find smaller bits and pieces every now and then, which will delve into the backstory.

Interact with many objects in the game, either to solve a puzzle, just for fun, or maybe to hit someone. It is up to you to discover all the ways to use the objects.

Solve the various puzzles you encounter throughout the game to progress further. You will either need to find evidence or clues in specific areas, or you might need to use logic to reach the final solution. The game will try to vary the puzzles, or, to be more precise, the way you solve them, and every puzzle will bring a different challenge!


The game features a Dynamic Scare System, which ensures that no two playthroughs are the same when it comes to terrifying moments. Jump scares are randomized, selected from multiple predefined spots throughout the game. This system keeps players on edge, avoiding predictable scares and guaranteeing a unique, spine chilling experience every time you play.


If you are interested in the game, and would like to stay up to date, please consider to add the game to your wishlist! Also, feel free to join the Discord community which is linked on the page, and visible on top of this page. And last, but not least, feel free to share your thoughts in the Steam Community as well!
